description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Shadows:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Shadow}s, enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FEAR} take 30% more damage and deal 30% less damage, and your creatures are immune to {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_FEAR}. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Shadow
